Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 3-18 in Western Conference games. New Orleans gives up 117.1 points and has been outscored by 9.9 points per game.
The Trail Blazers have gone 10-20 against Western Conference opponents. Portland is seventh in the league with 12.3 offensive rebounds per game led by Deandre Ayton averaging 2.8.

The Pelicans average 11.6 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.4 fewer makes per game than the Trail Blazers give up (14.0). The Trail Blazers' 44.9% shooting percentage from the field this season is 3.5 percentage points lower than the Pelicans have allowed to their opponents (48.4%).
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum is shooting 44.9% and averaging 22.1 points for the Pelicans.
Avdija is averaging 13.7 points, 6.1 rebounds and 3.2 assists for the Trail Blazers.
Brandon Ingram is out for the Pelicans due to an ankle injury.
Matisse Thybulle, Donovan Clingan, Deni Avdija, and Jerami Grant are all listed as injured for the Trail Blazers.
Others: The game is scheduled for Wednesday, 8 p.m. EST at New Orleans.
The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE is Pelicans -2.5; over/under is 226.5.
